duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver high-quality and engaging instruction in English language and literature to middle school students.
Effectively manage the classroom environment, ensuring a conducive setting for learning and growth.
Develop and implement comprehensive lesson plans and educational content that align with curriculum objectives.
Assess student performance and provide constructive feedback to support their academic development.
Demonstrate strong communication and interpersonal skills when interacting with students, parents, and colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university
Teaching license issued by the Nevada Department of Education
